name: B u r n t
description:
Grab the falling toasts, but avoid the burnt ones.

Controls

Keyboard - Left/Right

or

Gamepad - LT/RT

or

Mouse - click on the hands (hard + mouse = lunatic mode 😵)

Game made with Godot Engine.

Sprites made with Krita.

Sfx made with SunVox.

No music, sorry :(

My games are free but if you like them consider donating, every penny counts ;)

BTC: 1dkM8s6s99MT7q5tGQo195ixWzCBHsRDs
